Html: It appears there is some sort of error calculating crit rating for boomkin, which is forcing RAWR to prioritize crit over mastery.  As far as I know, crit is the weakest stat and should never be prioritized over mastery.  I've searched EJ and themoonkin repository this morning and was unable to find any information to the contrary.  I hope this helps and I certainly appreciate your program.
This should be in the issue tracker.
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
